creator: cjackman@q5systems.com

text:
I would enjoy it if you could explain in which way Tomcat is involved in
processing any of the instructions you've given. BZ is for reporting Tomcat
bugs, not a place to help you debug your applications or your DB access code.
You can try tomcat-user, but I assume you would be ignored since the problem
doesn't seem Tomcat related.
creator: remm@apache.org
